website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses other Beats headphones on almost every front: style, sound, battery life, and function.
pros: Attractive style and rich sound that has earned awards
Fast Fuel charging, 40-hour full-charge battery life, and Bluetooth capabilities
cons: They are on the high end of the price spectrum, but you get a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE #2!! DON’T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: CANT FIND REPLACEMENT EARPHONES SO UR F’D WHEN BUYING THESE. ADDED THE NEW PICS- DONT BUY THEM! PAY MORE IF U WANT REPLACEMENT PARTS! DISAPPOINTED CUZ I COULDNT AFFORD THEM!!! Thought these were great for the 1st month... NOW LOOK AT THE PICS! Pics may be dark but doesn’t cover or emphasize the crap I got. FALLING APART VERY FAST! I’ve been sitting on posting a review for 2 weeks! PLEASE DONT WASTE UR MONEY UNLESS U WANT TO WASTE IT ON ME! 😢SO UPSET SINCE I DON’T HAVE MONEY TO WASTE!!!!! TOTAL CRAP!!!! If amazon takes my review off I will keep posting!
customer_reviews.author: J M Smooth

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! This Beats Solo3 is 100% FAKE! It's ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! This Beats Solo3 is 100% FAKE! It's built with inferior materials and looks awful. Don't buy, unless you're into fake products.
customer_reviews.author: Marwan

customer_reviews.title: If you order NEW beats you might get Jason’s
customer_reviews.text: When you buy new, not refurbished beats, at FULL PRICE, you just might get Jason’s used beats. Jason didn’t even have the audacity to save the wrapping, put the cords in nicely or delete his name. They’re even scratched and greasy. Such crap that this got returned and passed through to another customer. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rax0ny

customer_reviews.title: Fake Headphones not the real beats solo by Dr Dre!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a Gift Card that I got for Christmas and was excited to get these when it comes in the mail because I’ve always wanted a pair of beats. I just got them in the mail right now and these turned out to be FAKE! I compared them to my sisters beats that her boyfriend got her and also watched YouTube videos and they are way different from what I got. I knew there was a catch to this and it doesn’t even match the description. Will be filing a return claim and will keep updated on status. Buyers Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it - waste of money! Keeps breaking and only one side works. I've sent this off to be repaired and it broke again after one week. Not a happy customer. They repair process was a joke - no email notifications were sent so I had no clue what was going on with the status. You have to sign into Amazon and view your order to actually see the updates from the repair. 2 thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey C. Knobloch

customer_reviews.title: At this point I have had the headphones 4 months ...
customer_reviews.text: At this point I have had the headphones 4 months and now they won't connect to Bluetooth. I also tried to connect them to a PC for an update but they will not connect via USB. I have tried to reset the headphones but that didn't work either. In contact with Apple Support now. This is my second pair of Beats and the other ones had to be sent in to be repaired because the right side stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: TonyBags

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones 4 months ago and for the first two months, the were great. A couple of months in, I started to have some connectivity issues and the earpads started separating from the base. Then the rubber headband started to come off. Finally, a couple of days ago, the headphones died completely. I charged them to 100% and the still won't turn on. I bought wireless Sol Republic headphones a couple of years ago and they worked fine until I lost them and had to buy new headphones. I got these Beats thinking they'd be an upgrade.... They're cheaply made sold at a ridiculous price. NOT AT ALL WITH THE MONEY. THEY ONLY LASTED FOUR MONTHS!
customer_reviews.author: Deresha Porter

customer_reviews.title: Amazon driver through this product on my porch
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is Amazon driver through this on my doorstep but luckily product works great
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I’m very VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are not made for anyone looking to seriously exercise in them. After 6 months the fake leather covering the ear pieces came off from sweat and that is even with beats protectors on. It’s now June 2018, so they two month out of the one year warranty and they simply snapped in half when I was taking them off at the gym. I keep them in a hard shell case, not rough on them. They simply feel apart from exposure to sweat during workouts. I’m very VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mckain

customer_reviews.title: More than good . Good job
customer_reviews.text: I got this item yesterday. I felt good so far use this product. I got new box without any straches or missing cable. All complete and new. I think this original product. I like use this when I was running on treadmill or doing exercise, but I'm not using everyday. I hope after use it still going well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Widi K

customer_reviews.title: good sound, small ear covering
customer_reviews.text: The sound was good, but the ear piece part was small for my taste. It put a lot of pressure on the outside of my ears...it wasn't super comfortable. If you have large ears, you may want to try them on first. But sound wise, they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you can't cook, buy Beats for some good eats!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They are authentic and come in the original packaging. I use them mostly to study (I listen to static noise) and I wear them during my runs. They fit a little snug, but that may be because I have a large head. They feel most comfortable without my glasses and earrings. When I listen to music the sound quality is amazing. I put them on when I am cooking and it really puts me in the groove. My chef skills have definitely been enhanced following the purchase of these headphones. If you can't cook, buy Beats for some good eats!
customer_reviews.author: Tori G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, quality and battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Been on the market for a while for a good set of Bluetooth headphones and these are by far the best set I've come across that are wireless and reasonably priced with excellent volume, bass and treble, and ease of use! With this type of product u really get what u pay for! At the sale price of $199 it's a great deal! I'm very picky about my music sources and sound quality and these instantly impressed me right out of the box! Highly recommend... It's worth the money...so happy I finally have my own "Beats by Dre" headset!❤👍💪💯 Don't sleep on these...super comfy too..can wear for hours without even noticing they're on!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy  R

customer_reviews.title: Cheats.. Not beats.. And if they are Beats QC is in need of some serious work
customer_reviews.text: These cheats are crap, the faux leather peeled and my kids can't wear them, theres no way to fix them as the plastic leather wont stay in place, my kids are dissapointed and Im out big money for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Wyzman

customer_reviews.title: I love my new beats
customer_reviews.text: I love my new beats. The music flows, its easy to pair with phones and computers, and the fit so easy
customer_reviews.author: Serena Luna

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July. Stopped working by September. Return window closed. Absolute junk. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas at the behest of my son. Overall sound quality is very good, as is the battery life. Where we ran into problems is when the right side quit working after 9 months. A quick internet search revealed we were not alone with this issue. Apple support was initially happy to send them off for warranty service but quickly denied coverage for a small separation of the left side housing. Seemed trivial but Apple was firm. For $200 I think you can do better. First and last pair of Beats for us.
customer_reviews.author: The Adams Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Sells Out of Date Products
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing Beats Solo 3's I attempted to buy AppleCare+ at the Apple Store within the 60 day window. Apple informs me that the "purchase date" was more than 60 days (in fact is was 120 days prior to my purchase date). Further, trying to get a US representative is nearly impossible. Instead you are placed on hold for more than thirty minutes only to once again being connected to a off-shore representative. AMAZON YOU HAVE GOTTEN TOO BIG FOR GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if looking for long lasting set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Both my beats solo 2 and 3 stopped working between 12-18 moths. Same issue with the right earphone losing hearing without being dropped, mistreated, or abused. The first I assumed was a defect. Having it happen again, I’m convinced it’s designed with a flaw to force upgrades and stimulate purchases. Contacted apple support and after shipping both out at a cost of $130 each to repair, they refused and simply told me to purchase new ones. Poor product and even worse customer service from apple. Bought the Bose qc 3 in the hope that with spending $350, the products quality will mesh with the price better than Beats cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: SOME ARE PREOWNED!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son in May 2018. He LOVED them until the right side quit playing. We contacted Apple since we were within the one year warranty time frame and they informed us that the serial number has been activated in December of 2017, so the warranty was already expired. Without the warranty they want 3/4 of the cost of a new pair to fix. We’re VERY upset that this is how we found out. Apple told us that sometimes other people sell returned items...which makes us out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Kinda pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend so much money on a pair of headphones. I've always just used the headphones that came with my iPhone. Now that the iPhone 7 doesn't have a headphone jack in the phone, I've been looking for wireless ones so I wouldn't have to search for the little adapter. After listening to music with these headphones I realized what a difference quality headphones make. I got the glossy white and they are really pretty (which is a weird thing to say about headphones.) I'm really glad I made the investment :)
customer_reviews.author: LKTrum

customer_reviews.title: They're giving me ear aches
customer_reviews.text: So i thought i had something wrong with my ears but nope it's the headphones. I've been wearing all kinds of headphones for long periods of time and I've never experienced headphones that would pinch your ears and give you an ear ache that you can't rest your head on the pillow because it's too painful. I've lost sleep, work concentration and money over these. Sound quality is better than other headphones I've used but none of those $40 headphones have ever made me loose sleep. Now I can't return them after using them for one month.
customer_reviews.author: hikama

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great
customer_reviews.text: I've had these since August 2017 and I loved them but I've noticed in the last few months, they don't seem as great. I feel like some songs are fuzzy suddenly and now like tonight, they just keep, for a lack of better word, stopping; the song will stop and I'll check the connection, it is still connected and the song is playing on iTunes, but there is no sound. I'll pause the song, push the little button on the headset, then push play on iTunes and they'll be fine again for a while. And then some nights I can't get them to work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for the branding, buy for Apple's W2 chip
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have decent sound quality for 1) bluetooth and 2) casual listening. They are on-the-ear style that come with a 3.5mm cable (for plug-in listening and full audio quality), a nifty carrying case. What I enjoy, however, is the pairing with Apple devices via their W2 chip. I recommend these for people with Apple devices (particularly if you have more than one). If you aren't an Apple user or have a mixed ecosystem, check out Sennheiser's HD series for better options. As they are "on-the-ear" phones, you may experience fatigue after several hours. By that point, giving your ears a break (for any headphones) for a few minutes will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. Once I turned on the Bluetooth on my phone the Beats Solo software automatically appeared. It seamlessly connected to my Apple Watch as well. The Matte Black comes with grey lettering on top which also indicates that it is real. The sound is nice and crisp, especially with some old school Metallica. The headphones feel extremely comfortable, sturdy and light. UPDATE: The USB BROKE IN ONE DAY. AMAZON REPRESENTATIVE INFORMED ME THAT ITEM IS REFURBISHED and NEW WHICH WAS ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, cheap, and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. You can either buy for the beats name or spend half the amount of money and get something equal, if not better quality. These will break easily due to being made of cheap material. Then if you try to fix them yourself, you will need a whole set up (Soldering kit, replacement parts, and a steady hand). You’ve been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: appearance & performance
customer_reviews.text: As a senior citizen (69yrs) I don't like ear buds. This was everything I wanted & more. I love the rose gold color & the sound was phenomenal!!! Unfortunately, on Feb. 4, 2018 our house burned down; we lost everything except the clothes we had on. Now I'm looking to replace some of the things I lost. This is first on my list.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality, but left side completely blown after a month
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these and have owned them for about a month. Love them and the sound quality for the most part; however, the left half of the headphones have completely blown out without warning, so now only the right side is producing sound. Very disappointed in the quality of these for the price that was paid for them. Who wants to listen to music with only sound going into one ear?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harris

customer_reviews.title: They are just okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a headphone expert and maybe I was expecting there to be a live concert in my ears but these haven't wowed me in the slightest. The ear cups are small and can get pretty uncomfortable how they sit on your ears, the sound is just ok. Not bad but like I said, I got just as good of a sound from a less expensive pair and to top it off, they pull my hair out every time I take them off. With everything considered, I wouldn't buy them again. I'm giving them to my kids and whatever happens to them, happens. I should have stayed with my less expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Daisybell911

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: First review, more reviews to come the longer I wear This head set. Wore them to the gym, they did not shift in any direction while wearing them. I wear glasses, I placed then just below my upper earlobe, no year pain after an hour in the gym. Sound was great, kept it at 3/4 volume, was just the right level to get going, but low enough to hear if someone was trying to tell me something. Quality feels good and durable. I have an Android phone, easy to connect to. I also have a Kindle, also a breeze to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Broken Beats
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones on March 11th I got them about two weeks later. They were great for about a month and a half. However, for the last week only one side is working.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: They are great for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Black Friday I was a little worried a lot of people in the comments say they are fake and bad quality I don’t believe that at all I’ve had them for months they’ve held up amazing and seem very high quality. My only small gripe is I wish they had a little more sound power and bass drive but overall I love them they stay charged for Weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Filippi

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Great sound and easy to connect. Battery life is also exceptional. After having to replace many cheaper brands after a few months, I decided to test out these. I have had them only a month so I cannot speak to longevity but will update if that is a problem. I did notice that, with the first two usages, my phone dropped the bluetooth connect after about one hour (mistakenly thought the battery died) but that has not since happened.
customer_reviews.author: milliebean

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE TO HAVE WARRANTY, Over Hyped due to "Beats" name
customer_reviews.text: One of my Best Buy’s (5 stars) UPDATE- My Beats broke within a couple months internally when I just unfolded them like normal and one side doenst produce sound. I am very dissapointed because I love these things, but for $300 and they break within a year and cost half the price to repair, I reccomend to get a pair of B&o's or Bose headphone cause the sound quality is way better. If you just follow mainstream in tech, youll probably considering getting a pair of these, but they are only ok sound quality for $300 and are like getting Supreme, you get it because it has that "b" and "Beats" on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: We got these on Black Friday which made them an excellent value. Overall, these headphones are very comfortable and above average from a sound quality standpoint. There are many cheaper options out there, many of which I have tried, but I think that these are really a step up. The other great thing about these was the iphone bluetooth integration which makes pairing very easy.
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: Good sound ! Small ear covers and pretty tight !
customer_reviews.text: Munson bought with his money this headphones. I have use them to test, the sound is pretty good but I don’t like the fit, they feel too tight on my head and the ear caps feel to little. They are not the big ear cover like other ones I’ve seen. I guess they are different styles I’m just saying I like the bigger ones that cover your entire ear. I couldn’t wear it for more than 15 minutes because of the pressure on my head. If I compare it to my BOSE I love my Bose thousand times more.
customer_reviews.author: YubiK

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: These were what one of my grandsons wanted for his birthday. I had no idea if they really were worth the money, but he was ecstatic when he opened them, as were the other grandsons. I listened through them and it was a great quality of music and sound cancellation. I've no idea of the battery life as I've not asked him. He still loves his headphones and Nana and Papa gained big points in gift giving with these. Hah.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaNC

customer_reviews.title: Apple/Beats, get your production fixed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Beats for my daughter and she loves them. This is the second set of Solo3's I've purchased for her. The left speaker failed on each pair. I've done research on the internet and learned that Beats has a problem with the left speaker failing due to a small wire being pinched during production. Unknown if this is the problem with the Beats I've purchased. The second pair I sent back for repair and am still waiting for them to be returned. Apple/Beats needs to address this problem immediately. Amazon has been great with their fast response to assisting us with sending them back for repair, however we were told ten days. It's been longer than that. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mavgw

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: They are so tight on my head I an unable to wear or use them -- they pinch and give a terrible headache. Also, if you wear them to workout or even walk, everystep reverberates into the ears. They are awful and they won't let me return.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Decent but could be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ll get to the point. Pros: - Noise cancellation is superb. Nothing should disturb your music sessions with these on. - Bass is adequate. Not earth shattering but good enough for a former bass head who had 10 inch subwoofers in my old Acura :-) - Battery life is great. Didn’t have to charge these things for days. CONS: - Decibels could be louder. I tried these at max volume on all of my devices and was disappointed. Max volume should have your ears ringing but not the case here. - mid range cords and vocals are lacking. - The case requires effort to get the headphones inside. It should be effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon B.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints! Came in original box with everything as described. I’m not a headphone connoisseur and haven’t owned any others comparable to these so I can’t speak to how they measure up to others. I had been told they were of good quality so I got them, and I have enjoyed them so far. Easy to set up, and the charge lasts a long while. If you wear them for hours on end, your ears do get kind of sore, but i would expect that for any type of headphone like this. Does a pretty good job blocking out surrounding noise. We shall see if they stand up against the test of time and are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: faithers226

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters birthday. I gave them to her yesterday. I ordered them on Amazon Prime day so the window for returning was August 18th. I assumed ( hoped) they would work directly out of the box. My daughter was so excited to get these and they don't work! One side of the headphones is silent. I am SO DISAPPOINTED and am wondering if perhaps they sent out faulty ones on Amazon Prime Day? I did not buy the warranty because I assumed these were high quality headphones that would work if taken care of. I guess I learned my lesson about buying something and holding onto it for a gift at a later date. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bartram

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pair of these and both stopped working via bluetooth after about a year. If you google beats stop working in 1 ear you will see all kinds of reviews. Beats is part of Apple so the support is the worst. I would not waste your money. For the price these should last many many years.
customer_reviews.author: Aharris

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these. One I bought from Apple and the other was from Amazon. I tried the The Amazon one because it was about $100 less and will not hold the charge when turned off. No support from Amazon or Beats. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on sale for $140 that day. That’s a decent price for them. I wouldn’t pay much more though. They are a little tight and pinch my ears after awhile—my head is not huge. NOTE: the studio version has noise cancellation, the solo version does not. I bought these bc they were cheaper and the noise cancellation function gives me motion sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Moth77

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided it was time to throw away my old head phones since they were basically being held together by tape. Caught these on sale during amazon prime day. The wireless solo's are great for the gym. I don't have to worry about the cord getting in the way during my workouts and I can go days without having to recharge the battery. The sound quality is great, legit cant hear anything but music when I'm wearing them. My only issue is sometimes the connection isn't clear when I'm running (probably because I'm moving).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over-Ear Material Detaches
customer_reviews.text: As a music lover, I could not wait to purchase my first pair of Beats. Getting the most out of music has always been a big thing for me. After saving up for months, I was finally able to purchase a pair of the Beats Solo3, only to find that after a short three months, the wrapping around the earpieces had begun to detach. After paying $230+ for these earphones, I was severely disappointed on the quality. If you do decide sink this much money into these, make sure to get a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Beats
customer_reviews.text: Received these today. Genuine, brand new product in factory packaging. I had the solo2 for a long time and have been pretty rough on them, gym sweat finally killed them. So I’ve read many reviews and have owned several pairs and have come to a few conclusions. They have probably the best sound of any headphones I’ve tried, they are pretty tough and I’ve used the Apple warranty before for a broken set, they just sent me a new pair. With my past experience and what I put these through I decided to buy the 2 year extended warranty for $24, total purchase was $179. I don’t think you’ll find a better deal anywhere on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats solo 3 headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones, and I was so excited to listen music. I brought these to the local best buy only to learn that they are fake. How terrible of Amazon selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Denisa Pletenikova

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were possible to give lower than one star. Ordered one day delivery and they came in 2 days late. But,when they came they were white when I ordered black. No original packaging, they were dirty, and the bluetooth said Sam's beats. I complained to customer service. So they sent me another pair which worked great for one day. Bluetooth function failed. I only bought these bc my beats studio quit working beyond their hard reset. But, all beats are junk. Would never recommend to even my worst enemy or the annoying kids in xbox live.
customer_reviews.author: Mikehancho

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works perfectly as a headset for phone calls too!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fabulous. I purchased these for my husband after he kept taking mine! The most impressive feature is that they work great on your phone. I talk to clients using my beats each day and they work perfectly. Clients comment on how well they can hear me AND I can hear them crystal clear. Not only that but they are extremely comfortable whether using at the gym or for work.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia A

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam!! These are not Beats headphones!!! Shame on you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maggard

customer_reviews.title: Apple and amazon Does not stand behind this product
customer_reviews.text: Had for short time and barely used went to place on my head and plastic arm cracked. Placed back into case until returning home from trip and contacted amazon who nicely said since it was 2 days out of return period apple would warranty and nicely put me through to apple. Apple had me send back but said it was physical damage and would not cover (via a note in the return box without even contacting me). Contacted amazon again as they had requested if apple didnt help. Only response was to put me back through to apple who couldn't tell me the cost to repair and diagnosis could be 100 dollar fee(according to the note).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Crain

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when expected, arrived as expected. I'm a repeat buyer, this is my second pair of BEATS Solo3 headphones (the other one is still fine, I just keep one set in my home, and the other is for when I'm mobile/outdoors). The sound from these headphones is GREAT! They fit well and are comfortable. They're easy to connect to various devices (I've used them w/Samsung smart TV, iphones and ipad). They hold their charge for long periods and are easy to use (power button, adjust sound volume, mute button etc.). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They squeeze my head. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is good but the headphones are super tight on my ears. Makes my ears hurt after wearing them to long. I should have bought the over ear version. They don’t cancel noise. The phone microphone is super sensitive and doesn’t cancel out outside noise. They are good for short use. Good sound and connect easily to my iPhone. I think Apple could have done a better job implementing more technology and comfort to these headphones. But then again they haven’t perfected the iPods, which I love but they need to fit in my ear better.
customer_reviews.author: Omahottie

customer_reviews.title: Right side stopped working after 200hrs
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were a splurge for me but turned out to be an expensive disappointment. Wireless solo3 right side stopped working after warranty expired. Took great care in keeping these headphones pristine and even bought an additional matching case. Fees to repair start at $130 with $7 shipping just to look at them. Waste of money and won’t be replacing them with Beats. I can buy better ones from other companies for less than the cost to repair or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are a joke.....
customer_reviews.text: love the sound, earcups get warm on ears. Biggest disappointment is the ear tap control.......totally worthless. It does what it wants. 3 taps back shuts it off. two taps forward................worthless. I still like them, but they are very over marketing sold. good sound, but the description is deceptive. GREAT BATTERY LIFE!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in July I got the matt black. When I open the Box it came with beats charger cable and small pouch accessories and it was already charged, it was so easy to connect to my phone and took hours later to died on me. charged again took it to the gym and it was perfect the wireless comes in handy I can answer the phone and talk perfectly would definitely recommend I will be buying more for Christmas for my husband and teen son.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love mine so much I decided to buy our daughter a set for Christmas. Iv used them for a couple of years. The sound is perfect pitch. They're easy hook up and use each and every time you use them. My favor time to use them are on a airplane flight. My ears just cant take offs or landings. I put them on and it help tremendously my ears dont plug up anymore or painful on flights. I highly reamend these.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough of these
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I lift with them or ride my bike (not always safe, since they are noise cancelling). I love the ability of being able to zone out and listen to music. They also bring a wire in case your rechargeable battery runs out of juice.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pena

customer_reviews.title: They didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I generally like Beats headsets. The sound quality is great and they are elegantly constructed. This is the second Beats product I bought. The first one (Beats Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphone) broke at the hinge after two years of daily, but careful use. I replaced them with the Beats Solo3, but they lasted exactly a year and six months before one of the speakers became intermittent and eventually stopped working completely. Beats headsets are expensive. I don't mind paying for quality, but I this will be the last Beats headset I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bruckno

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Beats headphones
customer_reviews.text: I won’t buy Beats merchandise ever again. The power button to operate the wireless function on these headphones quit working within a year and a few months of purchasing. Amazon would not stand behind a replacement. I was told to call the 800 number for Beats, and they were not helpful either. They will not replace since the headphones are only 5 months past warranty. They should last longer than 12 months because they are not an inexpensive pair of headphones. Very disappointing. Don't purchase this product unless you want to lose over $200.00.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Shady service
customer_reviews.text: Product was offered at the best price around, prime shipping, etc....no reason to be skeptical when purchasing. The product shows up as a used returned - I pulled a long blonde hair out of the earpiece. 1/8" phone wire has black streaks on it. I paid for a brand new product and what arrived clearly had been "test driven."
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great at noice cancelling
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are wonderful! Bought them for my husband for fathers day, they arrived perfectly in time. He looooves them. They’re easy to connect via blutooth to his phone, ipad and our TV. Battery lasts hours so they last a day-long trip. They’re great at cancelling outside noises so he can listen to an audiobook on a plane without getting interrupted, away from the hubbub. They are pricy but quality is beyond expected. This is the first paur of beats we buy but probably won’t be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Sotres

customer_reviews.title: REPAIRED/SOLD & STILL SOLD AS IN WORKING CONDITION!?
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, but inspected, and the right side only had SOME static/sound that I could hear at top volume. Started return process and agent said he notified some dept & Beats regarding the problem, so...hopefully...this pair of headphones doesnt get sold to yet another customer. BE CAREFUL WITH USED ITEMS EVEN SOLD BY AMAZON! Headphones failed to pair to an Android phone. Phone didnt recognize them. They might work after charging, but I didnt risk it due to the cost.
customer_reviews.author: lilbitz

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of Beats a few years ago and loved them. Bought these on Prime day for half off and as usual are my favority headphones once again. Very long battery and overall great sound. I also have Bose headphones and these are far superior in sound and quality in my opinion. I also like low end in music being a drummer.
customer_reviews.author: Drum JH

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Absolutely FAKE headphones - DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Earpieces are falling apart. This was an absolutely joke of a product to buy. They're not being worn for working out or any activity that would warrant the earpieces to fall off of the headphone. Prior to this, the leather around the earphone was coming off, like many other reviews stated. BE AWARE, this is either an absolutely fake product, or beats are some crappy headphones. More than likely the former. DO NOT BUY! Please! Save yourself the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a knockoff. These are the best sounding pair of headphones I’ve ever owned, and the decision to purchase was not taken lightly because of the cost. Sound quality is amazing. I’m hearing lyrics I’ve never heard before. The ONLY downside to these is comfort. They’re fine if I’m wearing them for only an hour at a time, but any longer than that and my ears start to hurt because of the pressure. It almost makes me want to consider saving up for a pair of over-the-ear Studios.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, terrible connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great if you can get them to connect to your iPhone. It takes about 15-30 minutes every time you want to get them to connect to your Bluetooth. I’ve tried everything. My headphones power button will be flashing and my iPhone will be searching and nothing happens. You just have to keep powering off the headphones and turn them back on to flashing or keep shutting your phone off and turning it back on. The 15th time of doing a combination of those things will eventually work and it will connect.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lause

customer_reviews.title: You're paying for the name, not the quality
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones because they look nice and the sound is pretty good. Unfortunately, after about an hour of wearing them, they start to hurt my ears and the sides of my head. Also the cable works for audio but the mic didn't work. I thought "no biggie" and ordered another cord but it was the same issue. Unlikely to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: YTYKM

customer_reviews.title: Factory seconds
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst overpriced headphones ever!! They will not sync with my devices, which is my main complaint. The device name is a bunch of lower case “j”. I think these were factory reconditioned. I rarely write reviews but, this is the third product I’ve purchased recently from AMAZON and had nothing but problems with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carter

customer_reviews.title: Durability issues/buy an extended warranty
customer_reviews.text: Love the product however it had to be replaced because it would not charge correctly. Luckily the year warranty covered it. This is the second pair I have had. The first pair has one headphone that no longer works and it wasn’t under warranty so I am stuck paying $150.00 to get it fixed. Therefore I bought a extended warranty for the the current pair. After paying over $300 for each pair I think they should last longer without having functional issues!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I work with a lot of virtual conference calls. I had a Jabra provided through work, but couldn't pass up the prime day deal. The wireless microphone in the headset is fantastic. Very important to mute as it will pick up quite a bit. Connects with ease to all my devices--iphone, bluetooth dongle on desktop pc, work lenovo laptop. I seem to only have to charge once per week. I was torn between this set and a bose set. I don't regret my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Cixi

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i wouldve just bought these at the store brand new instead of on here. Headphones are not new!!! Ive had them barely over a month and they wont stay charged for the bluetooth and now the sound is going out. I've only worn these probably a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Pajames

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for the “noise cancellation”
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones to replace a Phillips brand that more than exceeded my expectations for the price I paid. I chose Beats brand because of their quality reputation and was really excited for their noise cancellation ability. While the unboxing was impressive and I enjoyed a full charge at arrival, these offer absolutely no noise cancellation as advertised. I bought two pair: one for myself and one for my kiddo. For the price I paid, I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: martinst

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé gifted these to me for Christmas to replace my old Beats which were not wireless. I love these so much! The color is beautiful and actually matches my hair. Sometimes my family tries talking to me not realizing I can’t hear. The battery has up to 40 hours and it really does feel like it lasts forever. I can’t wait till I travel again because they are going to be amazing to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Nahley

customer_reviews.title: Headphones fell apart almost immediately ...after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were terrible! When the box arrived, it was not completely sealed. It looked as if it had been previously opened. Also, the zipper to the carrying case that comes with it was broken. After using it only 4 times, and within the first week of owning them, the material broke away from the plastic on the right side air phones as shown in the picture. Also, the headphones plastic cracked and split open and the backing to the auxiliary device mic fell off and wouldn’t click back on. I question the authenticity of this product. I feel like I purchased a knock off sent to me in an original box. Not happy. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I reeeeeally wanted to like this. I have another brand already and heard ...
customer_reviews.text: I reeeeeally wanted to like this. I have another brand already and heard my sister's Beat. I decided to get myself one. The sound quality does not justify the price. It is not far from the $37.00 wireless unit I have, but fine I was going to keep it anyways. Then the biggest obstacle was the functionality. On my headphones, I can easily maneuver back, forth and sound up and down. The Beats did not seem to have the feature. Nothing other than power on and off. I am rather computer savvy but could not make it work. Back to the MPOW unit. It functions better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blauqkween

customer_reviews.title: Warranty not honored!
customer_reviews.text: These stopped working on one side; the leather started coming off! We Sent them to Apple to fix; they accused us of third party tampering which did NOT happen and they sent them back in worse condition then they were when we sent them and now they are completely unusable. The warranty needs to be honored! It has not even been a year!
customer_reviews.author: paul anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wife seems very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these every time she goes to the gym - this is the first pair of expensive headphones that she is actually willing to use. Great battery life and works flawlessly with her iPhone. She is very pleased with the sound quality and it does a great job playing that hideous hip hop crap she listens to. Other reviews are luke-warm on this model but I can't agree with them - it's great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: looks solid but hurts my ears
customer_reviews.text: it s the first time purchase an on-ear headphones so can not compare with other products. I have it for around 2 months now, sound quality is a bit above average, It has plenty of bass. like other Beats products, quality looks good. The battery life amazed me, 1 hour charge and I use it for 4-5 days, 10hrs/day. The range is pretty far, more than 50 yards I still have good connection. The only thing bothers me is that it hurts my ears after around 1 hour of using. I tried to stretch it by put it over a few book, then use hair dryer to heat it up, leave it over night. It helps quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my hubby as a graduation present since the ones he had were the wired ones. Gave it to him for graduation and he originally didn't even use them for about a month. So, about 2 months after purchasing them the cover on the ear portion began to come apart. The thread just started to unthread and now you can see the cushion part of the ear. He doesn't even use them anymore. I am very disappointed as these headphones are not cheap and this was his graduation present for getting his Masters!
customer_reviews.author: Knitra1980

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a trip and I still love them. They work very well and match my phone. They have a case so I can keep the cord and charger all together. They are adjustable and easy to set up. Noise quality is really great. These are not noise canceling ones but they block out noise well. They turn off in MN cold if you do Bluetooth but work just fine with the cord. There are many color options too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great, until they don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a year. Nothing weird, just wouldn’t turn on one day. Sent them into apple for 130$ for service. After hours of dealing with the service department, they told me I “made product modifications” and they won’t fix them for the 130. These have never left the office. Essentially was accused of being some sort of bedroom hacker with my headphones? Stunningly ridiculous. They told me they’d fix them for $369. Not sure if they’re aware how much they are new? The whole experience is insulting, I won’t be buying more beats products.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure. I am an MPow guy that is very satisfied with the quality over my wireless headset. That said, I could not pass up on the deal during Amazon Prime Day. I got this headset for 55% off normal cost and have not been disappointed with my purchase. Very impressed by this headset. Mind you, I was the guy that would never spend $300+ on a pair of premium wireless headphones. At $146 you can't go wrong. ;)
customer_reviews.author: House Of Shark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have a long life
customer_reviews.text: Bought these over three years ago and use mostly for travel and when I'm walking. Had to take them to get replaced a little over a year ago because they stopped holding a charge and apple replaced when they could not repair. Well now the same thing is happening with the replacement. Couldn't get 2 years out of either head phone and since the one I have is a replacement no further warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. When my wife first used these
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. When my wife first used these, running outdoors, they only lasted 5 minutes then shut down. She fully charged and tried again and once again, they stopped working after 5 minutes. Amazon replaced and the new pair is doing the same thing. I thought I was buying top-of-the-line equipment. By the way, the sound is good until they shut down. Honestly, I wouldn't buy these if you live up north where the outdoor temperature falls below 32 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahjtt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, until it stops working
customer_reviews.text: Great product, until it stops working. 7 months use and no sound out of one side. Ear pads are also ripping away from frame and just look like material is crumbling. Still under warranty, so we will see the fix they offer. Will update. At this point, not worth the price we paid, wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Capecodredsox

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Poor Quality Materials & Construction
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly poor quality materials and subpar construction for a premium priced product from Beats (and Apple). The sound is solid - although they should get louder in my opinion - but after just a handful of months of "light use" they are literally falling apart. There are two places where the adhesive has worn off and the components are separating from each other. Keep in mind, I'm not some punk kid who doesn't care for his stuff, I'm a 40-year-old man who absolutely babies my electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: The replacement head phones were as expected and worked great! My son has enjoyed hours of listening time ...
customer_reviews.text: The first Beats Solo3 received did not work. They would not go wireless nor would they fully work while plugged in. They had many issues. Amazon immediately sent a replacement as I packaged and sent the return item. The replacement head phones were as expected and worked great! My son has enjoyed hours of listening time in the few days he has had them. The battery is amazing and he loves the sound and feel of the headphones. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DE2695

customer_reviews.title: Beats are for Moms too!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! As a Mom, I am typically not a “name brand” kind of person. These were a gift from my husband and really a splurge, but I absolutely love them. Doing laundry, dishes, and other housework is much more enjoyable listening to music and these do not fall off my head like other headphones and earbuds I have owned in the past. So any Moms out there who aren’t sure about these, just go ahead and make the purchase. High quality, easy to connect, and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised-5stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: love my headphones and if it gets soiled, I use a wipe or a damp soapy rag to clean it and it is a good as new. It cancels out everything and the battery life is as promised, I listened to my books when I’m cleaning the house, running errands, and doing choirs and I’m never worried that the battery is going to fail me. For how I use it you would think I would have to charge it daily, but I don’t. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PheonixRN16

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Beats and both stopped functioning after about 18 months. My last pair would not turn off. I did a factory reset that worked but now it won’t turn on. I’ve tried every trick known to the Internet to no avail. Beats updater says that my firmware is up to date and that my Beats are functioning. Obviously not. On a good note, the battery life and sound quality are both great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bulgin

customer_reviews.title: Great style and sound, terrible comfort (for me at least)
customer_reviews.text: I loved them for everything except for comfort. After less than 30 minutes, I continually had bad ear and jaw pain. I could feel my ears throbbing while wearing them. I tried moving them around and stretching them out to no success, so I'll be returning them. I'm definitely a believer in everything else about them, so I hope they make future iterations that'll work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Edo San Marzano

customer_reviews.title: For the 129 price - Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality, the lightness, and I’m pleasantly surprised by the comfort level. I have previously owned Beats Solo 2’s Wireless and they did hurt my ears after wearing them awhile. I’ve worn these for hours straight with no issues. The bass is sufficient and the Bluetooth connection with my iPhone is flawless! I’d say these were a great purchase at 129 dollars during the recent Cyber Monday event.
customer_reviews.author: John Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that for an iOS device there’s no iOS App. You have to go into Widgets and add Battery in order to see the level. Another issue is it should either charge via lightning or USB c cable, not micro USB. I understand it was bought from someone, but they could have changed the way it charges to be in line with Apple products. Other than that, I like the sound very much. The price was very reasonable. The battery life is awesome,
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE--- TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: These are HORRIBLE! I have gotten 2 different pairs for my fiancé. Both pairs will not hold a charge. When they do charge, the die very quickly. Disconnect from phone for no reason. Cannot even get to turn on anymore when they are fully charged. These are a waste of money and should be fraud for what the represent compare to what they provide to you. Two different pairs have done the same thing. It's the product in general. bad quality. Do not waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Colson

customer_reviews.title: It can be improved !!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1- looks amazing 2- Loud sound 3- fair bass Cons: 1- No Next/Previous track buttons. 2- Ears get too hot at gym because of the leather. I would really prefer if they made another sport line that contains cushion instead. Concentrate on the performance & comfort. The only difference between Solo 2 & 3 is battery which doesn’t make sense
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED but heavy bass
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bass hunter or like dubstep this is for you otherwise look for better quality headphones low range is non existent or muffled and medium is there but super heavy on bass and the wireless works well but not long range enough the earpads are the same from other models so they will ware out better to buy replacements now or higher quality ones. You are buying the name not good headphones. Decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth, great battery life. Suspect sound quality for me.
customer_reviews.text: My nephews wanted these, and they love them. They sound okay to me, but I'd honestly look elsewhere if you want a high-quality, comfortable pair of headphones. The bluetooth and battery life are the real pluses on these. The battery lasts forever, they charge pretty quickly, and the bluetooth has a really good range. The sound tends to be a bit bass-heavy and possibly muddy, and I don't know how comfortable they would be over a long session. I tried them out only for a few minutes and could only go off of my immediate impressions. Depending on your genre preferences, these may be suitable. For me, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Apple W1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, 40 Hours Of Listening Time - Gloss Black (Previous Model)
feature_bullets: High-performance wireless Bluetooth headphones in gloss black
Features the Apple W1 chip and Class 1 wireless Bluetooth connectivity
With up to 40 hours of battery life, Beats Solo3 wireless is your perfect everyday headphone
Compatible with iOS and Android devices
With Fast Fuel, 5 minutes of charging gives you 3 hours of playback when battery is low
Adjustable fit with comfort-cushioned ear cups made for everyday use
Sleek, streamlined design that’s durable and foldable to go everywhere you do
Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multifunction on-ear controls
The award-winning sound and design you’ve come to love from Beats, with premium playback with fine-tuned acoustics that maximize clarity, breadth, and balance
What's in the box: Beats Solo3 Wireless headphones, carrying case, 3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Universal USB charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B), Quick Start Guide and Warranty Card
